Caravel Transit – Analyze Transit GPS Data¶

Caravel-Transit reads and analyses transit GPS coordinates to discover routes and predict next bus arrival times.

  • Use Cases
    • Rider Use Cases
    • Historian Use Cases
  • Design Notes
    • RESTful API
    • Data Acquisition
    • General Transit Feed Data
    • Data Store Hierarchy
    • Distance Calculations
    • Location Finding
    • Route Discovery
  • Implementation
    • Low-Level Structures
    • Analysis and Profiling
    • Applications

Not to be confused with Caravel CMS (http://www.caravelcms.org/) or Caravel Games (http://caravelgames.com/)
